alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Howard; Merrick (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hamilton, west central Merrick and eastern Howard Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1243 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm betweeen St. Libory and Archer, or 16 miles northeast of Grand Island, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Central City, Hordville and Archer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
